titles.title: A resolution designating the week beginning May 20, 2007, as "National Hurricane Preparedness Week".
A resolution designating the week beginning May 20, 2007, as "National Hurricane Preparedness Week".

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary has been expanded because action occurred on the measure.)
Expresses support for the President's goals in proclaiming the week beginning May 20, 2007, as National Hurricane Preparedness Week.
Encourages the people of the United States to be prepared for the upcoming hurricane season and to promote awareness of the dangers of hurricanes.
